snippet: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include an opinion from a federal judge that concluded that a Facebook “like” was protected under the First Amendment. Plus, Apple’s mobile operating system was released to the general public.
abstract: Wednesday’s highlights from around the Web include an opinion from a federal judge that concluded that a Facebook “like” was protected under the First Amendment. Plus, Apple’s mobile operating system was released to the general public.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: The Release of iOS 7, and the Constitutional Protection of the 'Like'
